thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Creval 2017 Net Interest Income At EUR 392 Mln, Down 7% Y-o-y

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Creval 2017 Net Interest Income At EUR 392 Mln, Down 7% Y-o-y
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Creval:
* SAYS 2017 NET INTEREST INCOME AT EUR 392 MILLION, DECREASING BY 7% COMPARED TO EUR 422 MILLION IN 2016
* SAYS PHASING-IN COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 RATIO AT 10.6% * SAYS STOCK OF GROSS NON-PERFORMING LOANS FELL TO EUR 4 BILLION AT END 2017
* SAYS NET PROFIT FOR THE QUARTER OF EUR 70.8 MILLION * SAYS GROSS NPL RATIO AT 21.7% AT END 2017 Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
